name: E-commerce-app
information: With a focus on simplicity and clean design, this store prioritize user experience, making it easy for customers to find and purchase the products they need.

name: Movies-app
information: with top notch frontend technologies such as React, Redux & CSS. i used core concepts of react js such as jsx, components, props, state,  lifecycle of components, conditional rendering, lists, keys & Redux.

name: To-do list
information: A simple to-do list with use react & Css that enables you to write down your tasks so that you remember and accomplish them
